articles.description: Two Sprints and four regular Grand Prix weekends are out of the way, and it’s finally time to get the European season started with Formula 1’s second triple header of the year. There are no shortage of talking points after driver changes and team principal de…
articles.content: With another driver evaluation currently scheduled for between the races in Austria and Great Britain, the situation does mean the pressure stays on Colapinto to prove himself a better choice behind … [+1024 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Zelenskyy challenges Putin to meet him in Turkey 'personally' for ceasefire talks - NPR
articles.description: Ukraine and European allies had demanded Russia accept a 30-day ceasefire starting Monday before holding talks, but Moscow effectively rejected the proposal and called for direct negotiations instead.
articles.content: KYIV, Ukraine Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Sunday challenged Russia's President Vladimir Putin to meet him personally in Turkey on Thursday, the latest move in a weekend-long exchange o… [+6838 chars]
